p: The causal mechanisms, predisposing factors and natural course of supraventricular tachycardia (SVT) and atrial fibrillation (AF) are well described in people and to a lesser extent in dogs. SVT has not been well‚Äêdescribed in cats, and reports of AF are limited. The aim of this study was to describe the signalment, clinical findings and outcome for cats with SVT versus cats with AF.
